txt.en: 'Well met, [placeholder]. Did I, by any chance, see you sparring with the guards back in Imloth Melui? No matter. If the [placeholder] I saw was you, you are no common hand in combat.\n\n'Are you as keen in sight as in combat? Look down there and tell me what you see.'

Dindal the scout can be found high up in a secluded look-out, which can be reached by turning north off the east road from Imloth Melui.\n\nMerenir has asked you to visit his scout, Dindal, at the look-out and assist in any way that you can.

Dindal the scout can be found high up in a secluded look-out, which can be reached by turning north off the east road from Imloth Melui.\n\nDindal has asked you to stand by his side and look out to the north-east.
Merenir wishes to speak with you before you depart from Imloth Melui.

Dindal the scout can be found high up in a secluded look-out, which can be reached by turning north off the east road from Imloth Melui.\n\nNow that you have looked out to the north-east, you should talk to Dindal again.
A large force of Orcs has made camp in the Harlond before the wall

You tell Dindal what you saw.

'Your eyes are not poor. I have watched them for some time, and they are beyond count. All I can do is watch, but you are mighty and capable of much.

'If you were to help us against these Orcs, what could you do? Hm....'

'How relieved I am that all under my charge are safe within these walls, [placeholder]! Still, I must not take the arrival of these Orcs lightly. I have sent one of my best scouts, Dindal by name, up to a secluded look-out. It lies north off the road east of here. The unknowing eye would miss its rise up into the hillside of the mountain's feet.\n\n'There he will have a perfect view of the Harlond and the walls of Rammas Echor, on our northern border... for it is there, I fear, where the Orcs have crossed and entered Lossarnach. I would ask you to find him there and assist in whatever way you can.'
'I have one last favour to ask of you, [placeholder]. Or rather, Captain Merenir does. Believe me, he asks only out of our great need. We will hold you in great regard no matter your choice.'
Merenir stands by the entrance to Imloth Melui.\n\nLady Vanyalos has asked you to talk to Merenir, who has one last favour to ask you before you depart Imloth Melui.
DNT Meet the scout on the lookout
